title: Ep 103: The Microbiome and Probiotic Skincare with Dermatologist Dr. Whitney Bowe
itunes:title: Ep 103: The Microbiome and Probiotic Skincare with Dermatologist Dr. Whitney Bowe
itunes:subtitle: Dermatologist Whitney Bowe explains just what the heck the microbiome is (and why you should care), busts some old school skin myths, and adds some new beauty foods to your shopping list. Before that: We chat lip balm addiction; moisturizing at midday;...
description:
Dermatologist Whitney Bowe explains just what the heck the microbiome is (and why you should care), busts some old school skin myths, and adds some new beauty foods to your shopping list. Before that: We chat lip balm addiction; moisturizing at midday; and the new-school beer rinses.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
